name: Stichting Het Nederlands Kanker Instituut - Antoni van Leeuwenhoek ziekenhuis
membership: This registration covers the research institute, not the hospital to which the NKI is associated.
goal:
scientific cancer research (basic, translational, clinical)
cancer patient care
training of cancer professionals (researchers, doctors, nurses, and other)
interests: Budget, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: All files broadly related to life science research and health (e.g. FP9)
